card.sellContent: Get the best price for your automobile quickly and conveniently. List your car, get in touch with potential buyers, and have a hassle-free sale!
card.rentContent: Are you traveling and need a car? Enjoy a seamless, hassle-free rental car booking process while perusing a range of vehicles at the most competitive prices.
card.insuranceContent: Get the best insurance coverage to protect your vehicle. Obtain reasonably priced insurance and drive with assurance.
card.inspectionContent: Get a professional check to make sure your car is in excellent condition. Obtain a thorough report so you can confidently buy or sell.

about.title: What is CarsFinderPro
about.p1: CarsFinderPro is the leading classifieds platform for users in the UAE. Since launching in 2005, CarsFinderPro has become the number one platform for users to buy, sell, or find anything in their community.
about.p2: A community where unwanted goods are redistributed to fulfill a new need and become desirable again. Common used assets like cars, bikes, and cash are exchanged in new ways that provide convenience and a great user experience for all. Founded in 2005 by Emerging Group Holdings Limited, which also operates the largest real estate classifieds sites in Pakistan, Bangladesh, and Morocco.
about.p3: In April 2010, CarsFinderPro.ae was acquired by Dutch group OLX for about $1.1 billion to buy directly from locals in Saudi Arabia. The group also owns and operates Bayut in the UAE, Dubizzle in Pakistan, OLX in Egypt, OWN in Bahrain, and many other platforms across the broader Middle East including Saudi Arabia, Bahrain, Oman, Kuwait, and Qatar.
about.p4: Now located in the heart of Dubai Design District, the busy company has evolved, but CarsFinderPro remains unchanged with much more to come.
about.p5: If you need to buy or sell anything, all you need is CarsFinderPro. Let’s go.
about.cars_p1: The best place to sell your car. Over the past 15 years, CarsFinderPro has become the largest online car marketplace for buyers and sellers in the UAE. With daily views consistently surpassing other car marketplaces, we have over 1.2 million active users where you can buy or sell used cars.
about.cars_p2: Sell your car with CarsFinderPro. Want to sell your car quickly? CarsFinderPro is the easiest and cheapest way to do it. Highlight your ad and find the right buyer in no time.
about.cars_p3: New and improved: We're always working to enhance our site to make shopping for cars seamless. Just enter the make and model you're looking for, filter by model year, and let the search find your perfect car today.
about.cf_cars_p1: Whether you're buying or selling a car, CarsFinderPro.cars is here to help. From answering 'price only' questions to real phone calls, CarsFinderPro.cars is a hassle-free experience for you. But 'cars' is shorthand for classifieds, so you may find yourself in the top car destination.
about.cf_cars_p2: When buying a car in the UAE, it’s always a good idea to inspect it. With CarsFinderPro.cars, you can request a multi-point inspection for any car in the UAE. Book an inspection today to ensure your next car is worth buying.
about.cf_cars_p3: We also offer competitive financing and insurance rates through our partners, certified bank appraisal certificates, and more added services to make buying and selling your car hassle-free!
about.classifieds_p1: The best place to buy and sell. Did you know thousands of ads are posted daily, and on average, tens of thousands are searching to buy on CarsFinderPro while many more are browsing? CarsFinderPro is where you’ll find the best deals in town. No matter the price, size, or type, CarsFinderPro is where it gets listed and searched.
about.classifieds_p2: Highlight your ad! Want your ad to appear in the featured section? Just contact us about your ad! Highlighting your ad on CarsFinderPro pushes it to the top for greater reach and visibility, helping it sell faster.
about.classifieds_p3: Trusted by CarsFinderPro. Adopting a pet? Thanks to our partners, you can now safely adopt pets on CarsFinderPro through fully licensed vets. Look for the 'Trusted by CarsFinderPro' badge. Let’s work together to build better lives for pets — dogs, cats, pets, apps/approved.

insurancePage.legalProtectionDescription: Car insurance protects you from legal fees and financial losses in case of accidents or damage to third-party property.
insurancePage.personalAccidentCoverDescription: Car insurance covers medical expenses, hospital bills, and personal accident cover for you and your passengers in case of an accident.
insurancePage.financialSecurityDescription: Car insurance provides financial security for you and your family by covering repair costs, third-party liabilities, and legal fees.
insurancePage.peaceOfMindDescription: Having car insurance gives you peace of mind knowing that you and your vehicle are protected against unexpected events.
insurancePage.protectionAgainstTheftDescription: Car insurance provides compensation in case of theft or damage to your vehicle due to natural calamities, riots, or other unforeseen events.
insurancePage.legalComplianceDescription: Car insurance helps you stay legally compliant by protecting you from any fines, penalties, or legal action in case of any accidents.

termsOfUse.title: Terms of Use
section1Paragraphs: CarsFinderPro.com ("the site") is a community content website operated by BayL.com and its affiliates (referred to as "CarsFinderPro" or "we"). Content (as defined in Clause 3 below) is uploaded by CarsFinderPro and other users of the site.
These are the terms on which CarsFinderPro permits access to and use of the site, whether as a guest or a registered user. Please read these terms of use carefully before you start using the site.
By accessing and using the site, you accept these terms of use and agree to be bound by them.
If you do not agree to these terms of use, you are not permitted to use the site.
section2Paragraphs: You agree that Carwheel Limited (or its affiliates, as applicable) is the owner or licensee of all intellectual property rights on the site, and that the site itself is a collective work and/or compilation owned solely by YallaMotor. The site is protected by copyright laws and treaties around the world.
You may not copy, distribute, reproduce, sell, lease, sublicense, or upload any part of the site or any content (as defined in Clause 3 below).
You also may not modify or create derivative works from any part of the site or any content (except for your own content as defined in Clause 3).
You may not reverse engineer, decompile, disassemble, or attempt to discover any source code contained in the site or any software or database connected to the site.
section3Paragraphs: "Content" refers to any listings, forums, event postings, reviews, messages, texts, files, images, photos, or other materials posted on the site.
By posting content to the site:

You grant CarsFinderPro the non-exclusive, worldwide, perpetual, irrevocable, royalty-free, sublicensable right to use, copy, reproduce, distribute, perform, display, modify, or create derivative works of the content for any lawful purpose Carwheel deems appropriate.
You warrant that the owner of any rights in the content has fully and effectively waived all such rights and has validly and irrevocably granted you the right to grant the license above;
You allow any other site user to access, view, store, and reproduce the content; and
You grant CarsFinderPro the right to block, store, reproduce, or restrict access to the content to the extent it deems appropriate.
CarsFinderPro is not responsible for content posted or submitted through or linked to the site and should not be relied upon in any way.
CarsFinderPro reserves the right to (1) refuse to post or display, (2) transfer, or (3) remove any content posted on the site.
CarsFinderPro aims to update the site regularly and may change content at any time. Content may be outdated at any time, and we are under no obligation to update such material.
section4Paragraphs: Where the site contains links to other websites and resources provided by third parties, these links are provided for your information only.
We have no control over the contents of those sites or resources and accept no responsibility for them or for any loss or damage that may arise from your use of them.
section5Points: Services: Various premium services are purchased and accessed through different pages on CarsFinderPro.com. All prices are in AED.

Payment: All amounts due must be paid in full before the service begins. Accepted cards are Visa and Mastercard. You are responsible for any applicable taxes, fees, or duties. Payments made under this agreement are non-refundable.
Cancellations and Refunds: All refund requests will be reviewed case-by-case and granted at CarsFinderPro.com's sole discretion. Approved refunds will be made only via the original payment method.
Credit Card Info: No credit card details are collected. All credit card information will not be stored, sold, shared, rented, or leased to any third party.
section6Paragraphs: You agree that the electronic format of these terms of use does not affect their validity or enforceability.
These terms (along with any prepaid listing booking form) constitute the entire agreement between you and CarsFinderPro and supersede all prior agreements or understandings.
If any provision of these terms is found to be unlawful or invalid, it may be changed to the extent necessary to be valid and enforceable.
You may not assign these terms without written consent from CarsFinderPro. CarsFinderPro may assign these terms by posting notice on the site.
termsOfUse.privacyCollection: To provide a secure and useful service, it’s important that YallaMotor.com collects, uses, and shares personal information.
privacyCollectionDetails: Information published on YallaMotor.com is publicly available. Our servers are located in the UK and UAE, so by providing information, you consent to its transfer and storage there.

We collect and store the following personal information: email address, contact info, sometimes financial info depending on the service used; login data, statistics on page views and ad response; IP addresses and standard web log info.
privacyUsageDetails: We use users' personal info to:
Promote safe trading and enforce our policies
Customize users' experiences, measure interest, and communicate about services and updates
Send marketing offers according to preferences
Do other things for users as described at data collection
privacyDisclosureDetails: We do not sell or rent users' personal information to third parties for their marketing purposes without users’ explicit consent.
We may disclose personal information to respond to legal requirements, enforce policies, respond to claims, or protect anyone’s rights, property, or safety.
privacyEmailToolsDetails: You agree to receive marketing communications unless you opt out. You can opt out by following instructions provided with the communication.
You may not use our tools to collect addresses or send spam.
We may monitor messages for harmful content. We do not store or use friends’ email addresses for marketing.
privacySecurityDetails: We use encryption, passwords, and physical security to protect personal info.
All electronic personal data is kept private unless disclosed voluntarily.
Disclosing others’ contact details via the service is not acceptable.
If you violate UAE laws or our terms, you forfeit your privacy rights.

privacy.intro: This Privacy Policy describes our policies and procedures on the collection, use, and disclosure of your information when you use the Service and tells you about your privacy rights and how the law protects you.
privacy.dataUsageNotice: We use your personal data to provide and improve the Service. By using the Service, you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this Privacy Policy.
privacy.definitionNote: Words with the first letter capitalized have defined meanings under the following conditions. The following definitions shall have the same meaning regardless of whether they appear in singular or plural.
privacy.account: Account means a unique account created for you to access our Service or parts of our Service.
privacy.affiliate: Affiliate means an entity that controls, is controlled by, or is under common control with a party, where 'control' means ownership of 50% or more of the shares...
privacy.cookies: Cookies are small files placed on your device by a website, containing browsing details among other uses.
privacy.country: Country refers to: United Arab Emirates
privacy.device: Device means any device that can access the Service such as a computer, mobile phone or digital tablet.
privacy.personalData: Personal Data is any information that relates to an identified or identifiable individual.
privacy.serviceProvider: Service Provider means any natural or legal person who processes the data on behalf of the Company...
privacy.usageData: Usage Data refers to data collected automatically, either generated by the use of the Service or from the Service infrastructure itself.
privacy.website: Website refers to CarPro, accessible from carpro.quanticsols.com
privacy.you: You means the individual accessing or using the Service...
privacy.dataCollection: Collection and Use of Your Personal Data
privacy.personalDataExamples: While using Our Service, we may ask you to provide certain personally identifiable information including but not limited to:
privacy.address: Address, State, Province, ZIP/Postal code, City
privacy.usageDataCollected: Usage Data is collected automatically when using the Service...
privacy.cookiesUsage: We use Cookies and similar tracking technologies...

cookieTypes.sessionDesc: These Cookies are essential to provide you with services available through the Website...
cookieTypes.consentDesc: These Cookies identify if users have accepted the use of cookies.
cookieTypes.functionalityDesc: These Cookies allow us to remember choices you make when using the Website...

dataUseList.provideService: To provide and maintain our Service
dataUseList.contractExecution: For the performance of a contract
